items.sentence: We find the defendant, Tom Jackson, not guilty.
We have a lot of friends who are going to help.
Tom is apparently guilty of falsifying records.
Tom is beginning to look a lot like his father.
Tom is currently serving a three-year sentence.
We used to live in Boston when you were a baby.
I know Tom and Mary both have houses in Boston.
I know both Tom and Mary have houses in Boston.
Tom is waiting for Mary to tell him what to do.
How many times have I told you not to help Tom?
